Package jester

Class JesterGraphics

java.lang.Object
jester.JesterGraphics
public class JesterGraphics extends Object
JesterGraphics provides methods for rendering 2D graphics in the Jester framework. This class wraps around the Graphics2D context to simplify common drawing operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JesterGraphics()
    Constructor that initializes the default font.

      public JesterGraphics()
      Constructor that initializes the default font.

  • Method Details

    • setGraphics

      public void setGraphics(Graphics2D g)
      Sets the current Graphics2D context for rendering.
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics2D context to set.

    • drawRect

      public void drawRect(String mode, int x, int y, int width, int height, Color color)
      Draws a rectangle at the specified position with the given color.
      Parameters:
      mode - The drawing mode ("fill" or "line").
      x - The x-coordinate of the rectangle.
      y - The y-coordinate of the rectangle.
      width - The width of the rectangle.
      height - The height of the rectangle.
      color - The color of the rectangle.

    • drawText

      public void drawText(String text, int x, int y, Color color, Font font)
      Draws a string of text at the specified position with the given color. If no font is specified, the default font is used.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to draw.
      x - The x-coordinate to draw the text.
      y - The y-coordinate to draw the text.
      color - The color of the text.
      font - The font to use for the text (optional).

    • drawCircle

      public void drawCircle(int x, int y, int radius, Color color)
      Draws a filled circle at the specified position with the given color.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the center of the circle.
      y - The y-coordinate of the center of the circle.
      radius - The radius of the circle.
      color - The color to fill the circle.

    • drawEllipse

      public void drawEllipse(String mode, int x, int y, int radiusX, int radiusY)
      Draws a circle or ellipse based on the mode specified.
      Parameters:
      mode - The drawing mode ("fill" or "line").
      x - The x-coordinate of the center.
      y - The y-coordinate of the center.
      radiusX - The x-radius (for ellipse) or radius (for circle).
      radiusY - The y-radius (for ellipse).

    • drawRoundRect

      public void drawRoundRect(String mode, int x, int y, int width, int height, int arcWidth, int arcHeight, Color color)
      Draws a filled or outlined rounded rectangle at the specified position with the given color.
      Parameters:
      mode - The drawing mode ("fill" or "line").
      x - The x-coordinate of the rectangle.
      y - The y-coordinate of the rectangle.
      width - The width of the rectangle.
      height - The height of the rectangle.
      arcWidth - The width of the arc at the corners.
      arcHeight - The height of the arc at the corners.
      color - The color to fill the rectangle.

    • drawLine

      public void drawLine(Color color, int... points)
      Draws a line connecting multiple points.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the line.
      points - An array of integers representing point coordinates.

    • drawArc

      public void drawArc(int x, int y, int width, int height, float startAngle, float arcAngle, Color color)
      Draws an arc defined by the specified bounding rectangle.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the bounding rectangle.
      y - The y-coordinate of the bounding rectangle.
      width - The width of the bounding rectangle.
      height - The height of the bounding rectangle.
      startAngle - The starting angle of the arc.
      arcAngle - The angular extent of the arc.
      color - The color of the arc.

    • drawPoint

      public void drawPoint(int x, int y)
      Draws a single point.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the point.
      y - The y-coordinate of the point.

    • drawPoints

      public void drawPoints(int... points)
      Draws multiple points.
      Parameters:
      points - An array of integers representing point coordinates.

    • drawTriangle

      public void drawTriangle(String mode, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int x3, int y3)
      Draws a filled triangle defined by three points.
      Parameters:
      mode - The drawing mode ("fill" or "line").
      x1 - The x-coordinate of the first vertex.
      y1 - The y-coordinate of the first vertex.
      x2 - The x-coordinate of the second vertex.
      y2 - The y-coordinate of the second vertex.
      x3 - The x-coordinate of the third vertex.
      y3 - The y-coordinate of the third vertex.

    • clear

      public void clear(Color color, int width, int height)
      Clears the screen with the specified color.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to fill the screen with.
      width - The width of the screen.
      height - The height of the screen.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(Color color)
      Sets the current color for drawing.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to set.

    • drawImage

      public void drawImage(Image image, int x, int y)
      Draws an image at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      image - The image to draw.
      x - The x-coordinate to draw the image.
      y - The y-coordinate to draw the image.

    • drawPolygon

      public void drawPolygon(JesterVector2[] points, Color color)
      Draws a polygon defined by an array of points.
      Parameters:
      points - An array of JesterVector2 representing the vertices of the polygon.
      color - The color to fill the polygon.
